page.shortlink: api sql namespace connection class revoke access function
page.description: Revoke from a user or group the access specified, optionally, on the resource named.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = RevokeAccess(Name as C, AccessType as C [, Resource as C])

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The name of a user or group.

argument.name: Resource
argument.description: The type of access to grant.

return.name: Result_Flag
return.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The RevokeAccess() method revokes access to a resource from a user or group.
